caption.p: An overview of significant changes in the gene expression profiles of A. castellanii. (A) Gene expressions under different experimental conditions displayed using a heat map. (B) The number of genes with significantly increased or decreased expression (more than 2 fold). (C) Venn diagram showing the number of overlapping genes differentially expressed among 3 experimental conditions. L+A(12 hr)/A; L. pneumohpila infected A. castellanii for 12 hr/ A. castellanii, L+A(24 hr)/A; L. pneumohpila infected A. castellanii for 24 hr/ A. castellanii, L+A(24 hr)/L+A(12 hr); L. pneumohpila infected A. castellanii for 24 hr/ L. pneumohpila infected A. castellanii for 12 hr.
